reviewText:
The presenter shares with us some "safe" feel good ideas, But, giving dairy products a pass is SAD,

Casein, the main milk protein,  is "the most significant carcinogen we consume." (T. Colin Campbell)

SAD = Sad American Diet  Beginners to this area of inquiry should read "WHITEWASH."
Great series on health. Julie Daniluk used to be great on this show called The Right Fit, I watch it every morning here in the U.S And enjoyed the series
